channel.title: Tzhaar area/npc update
channel.description:
[i][b]Heya,
So its been a while since i released anything, so here it is, a completle tzhaar area/npc update. this will make all of your tzhaar npcs/maps look 525 and also the object tris have been removed, and everything is 100% correct, so enjoy :D [/b][/i]
Pics: [img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j418/Backup454/03-11-201016-12-33.png[/img]
[img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j418/Backup454/03-11-201016-12-58.png[/img]
[img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j418/Backup454/03-11-201016-13-21.png[/img]
[img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j418/Backup454/03-11-201016-13-39.png[/img]
[img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j418/Backup454/03-11-201016-14-02.png[/img]
[img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j418/Backup454/03-11-201016-14-34.png[/img]
[i][b]Download links:[/b][/i]
http://uppit.com/hwm2fwlh7j8h/Tzhaar_update.rar
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=4YMUDQR0
http://www.filefront.com/17470731/Tzhaar-update.rar/
[i][b]Note! - this pack includes all tzhaar npcs, uncluding jad, and every other fight cave npc. all you need to do is get the anims, which is easy :p[/b][/i]
note- im garyking from google so this is not a leech :D
Enjoy Gary

item.title: Tzhaar area/npc update
item.dc:creator: @man_killerx man_killerx
item.description:
@man_killerx wrote:

As a law, You are to post your work only. If you do post someone elses work, You need to have permission from the owner, And have credits on the work.

A little something called “Stealing”. An ancient word, Not many have heard of it these days.

Now, JaGeX has released a open source for people to work with BUT. You can’t post pictures, Or videos of it. And you cannot Accept any credit. It is for educational purposes only. (This is the only reason MoparScape has been able to stay under the radar).

This is also the reason why you can’t post ingame YouTube videos of RuneScape, Unless you have permission by JaGeX (Partnership).

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jkicool jkicool
item.description:
@jkicool wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:12, topic:367204”][quote author=jkicool link=topic=463382.msg3390671#msg3390671 date=1288899211]
i added this to cache/objectmaps and i only added objects so what i do wrong

[/quote]

THESE ARENT MAPS. how many times must we say it?

You pack these to the cache in main_file_cache.idx1[/quote][quote=“gary1988, post:13, topic:367204”]guys come on, these are models, why would u add models to the map folders? srsly?. put them in ur model folders /facepalm[/quote]
first im new to adding object and maps and i didn’t put it in cache i put it in model the problem is that the were in gzip format and after unzip i had remove the b at the end thanx gary for the nice update
